alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 27 at 2:28PM EDT until October 28 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding during times of high tide. For the Bayside communities of the Upper Keys, little to no relief expected even during low tide. * WHERE...The Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
